languages.text: "Вопрос семейный. Кунрад, наш бывший Мастер шепотов. Что можешь сказать о его предательстве и что нам ждать от него дальше?"
"Kunrad, our previous Master of Whispers. What can you tell me about his betrayal? What do you think he'll do next?"
languages.original_text: "Вопрос семейный. Кунрад, наш бывший Мастер шепотов. Что можешь сказать о его предательстве и что нам ждать от него дальше?"

traits.locale_text: "Kunrad, our previous Master of Whispers. What can you tell me about his betrayal? What do you think he'll do next?"
"Kunrad, our previous Master of Whispers. What can you tell me about his betrayal? What do you think he'll do next?"
"Kunrad, our previous Master of Whispers. What can you tell me about his betrayal? What do you think he'll do next?"
"Kunrad, our previous Master of Whispers. What can you tell me about his betrayal? What do you think he'll do next?"

languages.text: “关于前任低语之主昆拉德的背叛，你能告诉我哪些事情？你觉得他接下来会做什么事情？”
languages.original_text: "Kunrad, our previous Master of Whispers. What can you tell me about his betrayal? What do you think he'll do next?"

traits.locale_text: “关于前任低语之主昆拉德的背叛，你能告诉我哪些事情？你觉得他接下来会做什么事情？”

languages.text: «Kunrad era nuestro anterior maestro de susurros. ¿Qué puede contarme sobre su traición? ¿Qué cree que hará ahora?».
languages.original_text: "Kunrad, our previous Master of Whispers. What can you tell me about his betrayal? What do you think he'll do next?"

traits.locale_text: «Kunrad era nuestro anterior maestro de susurros. ¿Qué puede contarme sobre su traición? ¿Qué cree que hará ahora?».

languages.text: 「クンラッド、前任の囁きの主だ。彼の裏切りについて話を聞かせてもらえるか？次に何をすると思う？」
languages.original_text: "Kunrad, our previous Master of Whispers. What can you tell me about his betrayal? What do you think he'll do next?"

traits.locale_text: 「クンラッド、前任の囁きの主だ。彼の裏切りについて話を聞かせてもらえるか？次に何をすると思う？」

languages.text: "Kunrad, unser früherer Meister des Geflüsters. Was könnt Ihr mir über seinen Verrat sagen? Was wird er Eurer Meinung nach als nächstes tun?"
languages.original_text: "Kunrad, our previous Master of Whispers. What can you tell me about his betrayal? What do you think he'll do next?"

traits.locale_text: "Kunrad, unser früherer Meister des Geflüsters. Was könnt Ihr mir über seinen Verrat sagen? Was wird er Eurer Meinung nach als nächstes tun?"

languages.text: « Que pouvez-vous me dire au sujet de la trahison de Kunrad, notre ancien maître des murmures ? Que compte-t-il faire, à votre avis ? »
languages.original_text: "Kunrad, our previous Master of Whispers. What can you tell me about his betrayal? What do you think he'll do next?"

traits.locale_text: « Que pouvez-vous me dire au sujet de la trahison de Kunrad, notre ancien maître des murmures ? » Que compte-t-il faire, à votre avis ? »

languages.text: "Eski Fısıltı Üstadımız Kunrad'ın ihanetinden bahsedelim. Sence bir sonraki hamlesi ne olacak?"
languages.original_text: "Kunrad, our previous Master of Whispers. What can you tell me about his betrayal? What do you think he'll do next?"

traits.locale_text: "Eski Fısıltı Üstadımız Kunrad'ın ihanetinden bahsedelim. Sence bir sonraki hamlesi ne olacak?"
